amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to require the GAO to conduct a study of the effects of eliminating the mandatory source requirements for Federal Prison Industries, as specified in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record on Wednesday, November 5, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green (WI) amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Green (WI).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Green (WI) amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
